workflow.title: AI-Powered Sustainable Urban Mobility Planner
workflow.description: Leverages real-time data, AI algorithms, and user preferences to optimize and recommend eco-friendly transportation options for daily commuting by integrating public transit data, bike-sharing services, electric vehicle availability, and walking routes.

steps.name: User Preferences Collection
steps.description: Collect user preferences including preferred transportation modes, maximum walking distance, time constraints, and eco-friendly priorities.

steps.name: Real-Time Data Integration
steps.description: Fetch real-time data from public transit APIs, bike-sharing availability, electric vehicle stations, and traffic conditions.

steps.name: Walking Route Calculation
steps.description: Compute accessible walking routes within the user's maximum walking distance.

steps.name: AI Route Optimization
steps.description: Apply AI algorithms to combine available transportation modes, user preferences, and real-time data to generate personalized and optimized travel plans with low carbon footprints.

steps.name: Carbon Footprint Estimation
steps.description: Estimate carbon footprint savings for each recommended travel plan.

steps.name: Route Recommendation
steps.description: Present personalized, efficient, and eco-friendly travel options to the user.

steps.name: Automated Notifications Setup
steps.description: Set up automated notifications for transit delays, traffic condition changes, and carbon footprint savings updates.

triggers.description: Trigger workflow daily at user-defined times for commute planning and updates.
Trigger notifications when there are delays, traffic changes, or significant carbon savings updates.
